vote.title: Appointment of Bill LaFayette, Founder and Owner, Regionomics, LLC, 1293 S. 4th Street, Columbus, OH, 43206, to serve on the Mid-Ohio Regional Planning Commission, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or he resigns (biography attached).
vote.description:
Title
Â 
Appointment of Bill LaFayette, Founder and Owner, Regionomics, LLC, 1293 S. 4th Street, Columbus, OH, 43206, to serve on the Mid-Ohio Regional Planning Commission, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or he resigns (biography attached).
